attributes.action: Strip Harvey Weinstein of his honorary OBE
attributes.background:
There is now irrefutable evidence that proves that Weinstein is guilty of various counts of sexual assault and harassment over the last three decades.
The UK must not be complicit in condoning Weinstein's actions or creating a culture in which instances of sexual assault/harassment go unchallenged.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
